title: Womens Dress
title_original: Sleevey Wonders Women’s 3/4 Length Slip-On Jersey Sleeves – Sheer Reversible Arm Cover Up, Cooling Shrug Bolero for Dresses

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #122,698 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #97 in Women's Shrug Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Shrugs

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sleeve cover up great for under sleeveless dresses and tops, providing good arm coverage and comfort. The product receives positive feedback for its quality, appearance, and ability to expand wardrobes, with one customer noting it works well with scoop necks and tank tops. Customers disagree on the fit and value for money.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft sleeves. Great.
items.body: I bought this product. The fabric feels really good. It’s breathable and it’s a great fit on me. Read more
items.author: Deborah Krantz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cover
items.body: Getting friends to buy as well. Soft material. Well made. Perfect to cover arms. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size and fit perfectly
items.body: This product is ingenious! Very comfortable also. Read more
items.author: bonnie beddall

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Recommended size was too big. I would suggest downsizing
items.body: Honestly, I haven’t even taken the tag off yet. The size I got that was recommended for me is way too big. Read more
items.author: MonikaM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feel confident in those sleeveless dresses.
items.body: Old age has crept up on me. Flabby upper arms which can be a bit embarrassing. No more. This unit is comfortable, light weight, non-binding and fits me perfectly. I am large busted (36 DD) and it is not constricting. I was concerned about the neckline but it works fantastically with scoop necks and tank tops. Just wish it came in more colors and maybe one with sheer sleeves. Read more
items.author: Barbara S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricey but good quality
items.body: This works great for covering my arms when wearing sleeveless or short sleeve tops without being hot. It is a bit pricey, but the quality is good and it fits well. I may order another one. Read more
items.author: Metal.Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m glad I bought this
items.body: This item offers the ability to wear clothing you didn’t want to wear because it was sleeveless. Now you can . Comfortable material Read more
items.author: Olivia Beams

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars You are NOT getting what you paid for...
items.body: I should be clear here, this item of clothing does what it says it will. It provides you with a pair of sleeves to wear with a sleeveless garment. Be aware that the sleeves are not as long as depicted in the photography and are not 3 quarters, more like a half sleeve. But that's minor compared to the issue of the fabric and the other materials used in construction of the garmet. If you are hoping to wear this under a nice sleeveless dressy dress or cocktail dress or even a business suit shell and have it blend, search elsewhere. The fabric, the elastic, and even the clasp are as cheap as you can get. Cheaper than cheap. I have 5 year old $5.00 t-shirts constructed of better fabric. The reason why you are being told to hand wash is this fabric and elastic are so cheap they will be ruined in even the lightest cycle and the manufacturers knew this. It is true they are providing us who want to cover our arms with an item that is very difficult to find. For the money I was at least expecting a nice fabric that would ordinarily be used in constructing a bra cup and fit as smoothly under a dress or top. This fabric does not fit smoothly. Forget wearing it with something clinging. Whoever is selling this should be ashamed of themselves. They could have done so much better for a few cents more. Read more
items.author: Cat on Sam St.

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
